page.title: 09TARRANT MONKTON CHURCH
page.content: The parish church at Tarrant Monkton is called ALL SAINTS and the vicar was going to give us a talk about it but he had to go to another church the week before we visited.An old man told us the oldest part of the church was built in 1400 and the rest of it later.It was very grey looking with lots of hints in between blocks of stone.It had a slate tile roof and a square tower.Inside the church there were modern things like heating,lights and a microphone.It looked like a religious disco.There were old oak pews with new kneelers and bibles in every seat and a small organ tucked away in the back.Outside the oldest grave was dated 1813 and the newest was 1984.
